ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:55:39 [Issue ID 4000-382924] urn:comicvine:4000-382924 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:09:20. [Issue ID 1060977]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The remains of the space station are discovered in the Sahara. The crew, which teleported from the space station before it exploded, are trying to determine where they are and are starting to mutate from the virus. Dade continues to re-awaken from his coma.
Includes 2 page World Corp advertisement for "Trans-Island Skyway", 1 page advertisement for "Nigel", a World Corp robot, and 1 page adverisement for Cubiq.
ComicInfo.Tags: Simon Grimshaw,Space,World Corp.,Dade Ellis,Thomas Walker,Emerson Strange,Tunisia
